body_html:
I am looking into this - It might be quite big changeset. Everything points to gpu device creation (https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc#L591) as gpu_device_name (https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/framework/test_util.py#L61) returns an element from list_local_devices() that trails back to the ListDevices (a list of the devices registered in the session)

The dev branch is here: https://github.com/lukeiwanski/tensorflow/tree/dev/gpu_device

body:
I am looking into this - It might be quite big changeset. Everything points to gpu device creation (https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc#L591) as _gpu_device_name_ (https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/framework/test_util.py#L61) returns an element from _list_local_devices()_ that trails back to the _ListDevices_  (a list of the devices registered in the session)

The dev branch is here: https://github.com/lukeiwanski/tensorflow/tree/dev/gpu_device
